name: 40" Diameter Retro Mirror
description:
I started making these wooden mirrors in 2001 when my family decided to host a craft show.  I was looking for a high impact piece that was affordable.  At my first show I sold five and I have not stopped making them since.  The design has evolved over time, but the basics remain the same.  Standard size = 40-44" diameter / Color = customizable, although the favorite is bronze (pictured here)
I have not quite figured out the shipping for these which is why this posting is inactive, so please contact me if you are interested and we can discuss this further.

name: Paint Your Personality: Something Blue
description:
These pendants add a pop of color and a little bit of fun to your day.  

I used a Sherwin Williams paint chip in 1" base metal bezel and set it in a sun cured resin.  Chain is not included.

Shipping included for purchases made in the United States and Canada.

description:

name: Daily Reminders: Life
description:
Daily Reminders: "Future, Health, Self, Life, Love, Family, Heart"

Daily Reminders are items meant for daily wear that can help to encourage, remind, and/or motivate through the use of words or phrases that help push you in the "right" direction.  

Daily Reminder bracelets are made from base metal, recycled paper and sun cured resin.  Custom pieces can be made to order with customized color and text .  Allow approximately one week from date of purchase for your selection to arrive.

Shipping included for purchases made in the United States and Canada.

name: Daily Reminders: Feed Your Faith
description:
